mapper.select: select c.id id,g.id goodsId,g.name goodsName,g.price goodsPrice,c.goods_count goodsCount,b.id businessId,b.name businessName,u.id userId from shop_cart c LEFT JOIN `user` u on c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN goods g on c.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN business b on g.business_id = b.id where u.id = #{uid}
